title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, exposing sync/async APIs and chat/completion endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; fetch-based with full type definitions.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration providing Ollama chat, embeddings, and tool-calling components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama featuring multi-model chats, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions, Spring Boot starter, and reactive APIs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app that performs RAG over local documents using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline GitHub Copilot-style code assistants.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client with conversation history, markdown rendering, and keyboard shortcuts.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing Ollama generators and embedders for production NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with one-line commands to run Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and both sync/async streaming APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate exposing Ollama chat, embeddings, and model management with Tokio.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on Windows/macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-wide LLM interactions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets users query local Ollama models from within notes via templates.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer behaviour and LiveView examples for real-time chat.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart package for Flutter apps to integrate Ollama chat, completions, and embeddings.
